October 26, 195^ - Tuesday, 2:30 F.M. Meeting with Administrators
Introduction of Board and academic administrators. Orientation session.
Presentation moderated by Bull. Skornia described nature, function and ser¬
vices of HASB. Ausmus discussed foundation and association relationships
School®/ reported on financial status and organisation,,
Questions then brought up for discussion. Advisors discussed questions
with the Board. It was recommended and accepted that the HABB Board would
continue to consult with educational administrators, leaders, and specialists
on the basis of need, nature of the problem, and help desired. Eventually, a
regular or semipermanent Board of Advisors might be set up; but for the im¬
mediate future, advice would be sought as needed,
October 28, 195**- * Thursday, 9:00 A.M* Business Meeting
Movqd that reading of minutes and rolleall be postponed to a later period,,
Seconded, Carried unanimously.
Committee reports called for. Mr. Bunn reported for Membership and Cre¬
dentials Committee. Moved that Membership and Credentials Committee report
be accepted. Seconded, Carried. (Beport submitted)
